artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Openweave warp stripes in various threads and textures. Gold warp. Brown, rust, white, beige weft. Loose plain weave.Tag inside folder reads "Cornsilk, HCY/11A/2, 50", silk, viscose, jute, cotton, & rayon" (rust, brown, white, beige, gold)
